title: Postage stamp commemorating 75-yr of Pak-Turkiye diplomatic ties unveiled
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sept 13 (APP): Foreign Secretary Muhammad Syrus Sajjad Qazi and the Ambassador of Turkiye to Pakistan Dr. Mehmet Pacaci on Wednesday jointly unveiled a postage stamp commemorating 75 years of establishment of Pakistan and Turkiye diplomatic ties, at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
https://x.com/ForeignOfficePk/status/1701997964137496915?s=20
“The event showcased enduring bonds of brotherhood and fraternity between two nations & people,” Foreign Office Spokesperson posted on her X handle.
